mapper.select: select QNA_NO,QNA_MEMBER_ID,QNA_TITLE,QNA_DATE from (select ceil(rownum/20) as pagenum,QNA_NO,QNA_MEMBER_ID,QNA_TITLE,QNA_CONTENT,QNA_DATE from qna) where pagenum = #{page}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_no, qna_title, qna_member_id, qna_content) values(#{qna_no},#{qna_title},#{qna_member_id},#{qna_content})
